channel.title: i need some help
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "i need some help" - i got questions about stats and a quest, and i need an item

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded:
Look at the words in parentheses.

If you can handle another eating another three greassy items, then you can pass the check. If you, for some reason, can't tell, just use a 'diet' soda to reset the amount you can handle to three.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: on the buger ninja quest "super size" it says "I have no negative Greass affecting me (I can currently handle three more Greassy Items today)" i don't get that part, i can eat 3 greassy items a day yet it said i failed. When then it says negative greass affects did they also mean i shouldn't be losing 5 stamina on the buger ninja missions also and if so how do i stop losing 5 stamina?

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded:
Terri is one of the few normal Allies that can safely go into the Wastelands, along with Mr Sandman and SNAKEMAN.

The jutsu you should use depends on whether you have enough natural Gen Range to get at least 1 Success from rolling, i.e. 15 or higher. If you do, use your Sword Call Jutsu to get 2 successes, and, assuming you have the Letter of Marque, hope you can roll 1 more.

If you don't have enough range, your best bet is Lil Bo's Welcome to Good Burger. It's 500 C to use, but it gives +2 range for only the cost of a Tasty Burger. Although, again assuming LoM, you'll pretty much have to hope you can roll all 3 successes needed.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: If you cant do yhe first part of revenge then forget about the wasteland.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: You might also want to check out your village storehouse. Many villagers dump their ash-covered whatevers once they've gotten what they need from that category (Ash Covered Runes not so much, but just about everything else will show up sooner or later).

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: If you want Cobalt shafts, either ask if someone in your village has some non-appraised shafts (you can't trade appraised shafts) they don't need or just memorize which missions drop them and grind (might wanna get the Spice and Wolf team for this). You can't do anything about what the ash covered shafts turn though.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: i dont see why you are doing Wastelands quest. if your going to focus on any bloodlines you should go after your trade/reaper. trade gives you a +50% bonus jutsu when going for sannin. reaper gives +50% ally bonus. on top of this, reaper gives a +2 success jutsu, which imo is worth it alone.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded:
Best jutsu depends.

Do you naturally have the 15 Range you need to get a success? If so, use Sword Call. It's still 0 Chakra, and along with the Letter of Marque, gives you 3 of the 4 needed successes right off the bat. After that, it's a matter of luck to get the last success.

If your natural Range is below 15, your best bet will be Lil Bo's jutsu Welcome to Good Burger. Even at 10x Chakra Costs, it's still only 500 Chakra to use it. You need a bit more luck this way, as you usually need to roll at least 3 natural 15+'s.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: well chakra cost are 10x what they usually are for that quest so you cant really use jutsu on that quest because the chakra cost is probably beyond your max, you can still use jutsu that costs 0 chakra i believe. Perhaps the sword jutsu could be used on it, not 100% sure though.

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded: Most of them. The quest itself lists out what you keep and what you loose before you complete it (just back out and sell or give away the stuff you won't keep).

item.title: Re: i need some help
item.content:encoded:
Ok..
The numbers next to your gen, nin, and tai stats are the bonuses or penalties you get to those stats due to items/edibles/bloodlines.

What are your nin stats/levels? You probably shouldn't attempt it unless you're a jounin. A ninja dog/letter of marque/duelist's items are probably the easiest way to up your range. Kido: Slayer would be an ok jutsu to use but it's mad expensive. Lil' Bo's "Welcome to Goodburger" would be pretty good to up your range. Also, teams are very important. Get a good team liiike, Ro-Sham-Bo Redux, Crazy Love Triangle, Never Say Yaoi, and Ultimate Showdown would be best. You'd easily make the range and all of your rolls would be successes.

You can trade items between accounts using an avian attraction spray. But remember you can only trade once per day annd not between your own accounts. You could also ask your Kage to let you take the item. The mission is rare, so you won't get it much. And if you aren't white eye or don't have EDUT, it'll take some time to get it. Also, I don't feel that reaper missions are very useful if you're Season 1, unless you're trying to get a hollow jaw. But it would be easier to do in later seasons since tasty burgers loop, and you'd be able to move on to monochrome afterwords.
